member.name: T:EMT.Assets.UniformAsset
member.summary: Note that a uniform is more than just the clothes of an actor - it replaces the entire prefab specified in the ActorAsset.

member.name: F:EMT.Assets.AssistantTutorialAsset.Page.TitleKey
member.summary: Localization key for title to display.

member.name: T:EMT.Assets.Components.Animation_TimeOfDay
member.summary: Controls an Animation component, based on normalized time of day.

member.name: T:EMT.Assets.Components.AssetComponent
member.summary: Base class for components that can be used on RHQ assets.

member.name: T:EMT.Assets.Components.CheckQualityLevel
member.summary: Activates/deactivates a target GameObject based on current quality setting.

member.name: T:EMT.Assets.Components.SmartObject_ItemSlot
member.summary: Shows the item prefab for the n-th item slot of a SmartObject.

member.name: T:EMT.Assets.Components.SmartObject_ObjectActivator
member.summary: Activates/deactivates target GameObjects based on the state of the SmartObject type.

member.name: T:EMT.Assets.Components.VehicleRoot
member.summary: For ground vehicles, this component can be attached to any GameObject in its SmartObject prefab. It is used to handle driving animations automatically, using the GameObject it is attached to as root, so other stuff like garage is not moved around.

member.name: T:EMT.Assets.Components.LevelSoundsConfig
member.summary: There should be at most one instance of this component in a level. Defines fmod sound event names for sounds that may be overridden by a level.

member.name: M:EMT.Assets.Components.LevelSoundsConfig.GetSoundOverride(System.String)
member.summary: quick lookup to allow overrides of sounds. returns input if no override found.
